precaution: Remove any objects you may knock off from the table
instruction: Sit at a table with a pink and a yellow post-its in front of you.
Rest your right hand on the table.
With your left hand, place the pink post-it at the edge of the table away from you.
With your left hand, place the yellow post-it at the edge of the table right in front of you.
Position your right hand on the yellow post-it.
Reach forward with your right hand to touch the pink post-it by extending your elbow. Use your left hand to assist in moving right hand if needed.
Return your hand again to the yellow post-it.
Reach forward with your right hand to touch the pink post-it by extending your elbow. Use your left hand to assist in moving right hand if needed.
Return your hand again to the yellow post-it.
Rest your hand on the table.
